title: Imperial Wars and My Stratagems ~ Until History’s Most Powerful Nation Is Created ~ - Novel Updates
tags: Alternate World   Antihero Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Clever Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Elves   Evil Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Military   R-15   Schemes And Conspiracies   Strategic Battles   Strategist   Transported to Another World   Wars
author: Hot Spring Library   Onsen Bunko   温泉文庫
description:
It’s a story about a former Japanese person secretly maneuvering in a different world that has accumulated history in the same way as Earth.

Concealing himself from they eyes of people, he has no interest in things like honour and wealth at all and only moves for the sake of his goals. Before long he starts to influence the movements of the world from the shadows.

The protagonist will change.

Based on the Annals of the Three Kingdoms, it’s aimed at those being curious about military history and those, who don’t know the Annals of the Three Kingdoms, enjoying to read about it.>
